name: Shopline Ltd.
description: Developer of a DIY e-commerce platform designed to create online shops for merchants in Asia. The company's e-commerce platform allows merchants to apply for one free custom domain for their shop and provides professional and well-designed to customize their storefront, enabling them to launch an online shop in minutes, no coding required.
one_liner: Developer of a DIY e-commerce platform designed to create online shops for merchants in Asia. The company's e-commerce platform allows merchants to apply for one free custom domain for their shop and provides professional and well-designed to customize their storefront, enabling them to launch an online shop in minutes, no coding required.
